long_description: Protect your rope form the wear and tear of abrasion and sharp edges. Easy-to-place Spiroll extends the life and reliability of your rope. It self-wraps around the rope for a snug fit--no need to tie it off. Constructed of an elastomeric polymer for maximum durability. Winter bonus, wrap ice screws in Spiroll to protect points and your pack during transport. Stores easily on coiled rope.
short_description: Protect your rope form the wear and tear of abrasion and sharp edges. Easy-to-place Spiroll extends the life and reliability of your rope.
